title: Where is Ross Ulbricht (Silk Road) now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ross Ulbricht is not personally online. He has no direct Internet access. On 31 May 2017, a Second Circuit appellate court rejected the appeal of Ross Ulbricht, who two years ago was sentenced to life in prison without parole for creating and running the Silk Road, a massive dark web drug market. Silk Road Creator Ross Ulbricht Loses His Life Sentence Appeal As of 6 June 2017, the http://FreeRoss.org website gives this address: Ross Ulbricht, #18870-111 Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007-1704

ATTENTION: ROSS ULBRICHT or ANY OTHER FEDERAL PRISON INMATE CAN BE FOUND BY USING "INMATE LOCATOR" at the following LINK by ENTERING AT LEAST ONE DESCRIPTOR IN THE APPROPRIATE BOX: Federal Bureau of Prisons  The link informs you of where to write, other ways to contact, what they can get for mail, visiting information, how to send money, etc.,etc.  It is possible that he has some internet access.
If by "online" you mean in prison, then yes.  He's in NY Metro prison these days: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center150 Park RowNew York, NY 10007-1780 Contact Us | Free Ross Ulbricht
Ross was sentenced to life in prison on the 29th of May 2015: Silk Road operator Ross Ulbricht sentenced to life in prison
